metadata.description: Complete Agile methodology for workflow optimization
metadata.application: AI agent training for organizational process improvement

core_values.value: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools
core_values.workflow_application: Prioritize human communication and collaboration in approval processes
core_values.operating_model_impact: Design approval hierarchies that enable direct communication between stakeholders
core_values.inefficiency_detection: Look for processes that rely too heavily on systems instead of human judgment

core_values.workflow_application: Focus on functional workflows rather than excessive documentation
core_values.operating_model_impact: Minimize bureaucratic overhead and focus on value-delivering activities
core_values.inefficiency_detection: Identify processes with excessive documentation requirements that don't add value
core_values.optimization_guidance: Streamline documentation to essential business value only

core_values.workflow_application: Enable direct stakeholder collaboration in travel approval processes
core_values.operating_model_impact: Create structures that facilitate collaboration between internal customers and service providers
core_values.inefficiency_detection: Spot processes that create adversarial relationships between departments
core_values.optimization_guidance: Foster collaborative approval processes with shared accountability

core_values.value: Responding to change over following a plan
core_values.workflow_application: Create adaptive workflows that can handle exceptions and changes
core_values.operating_model_impact: Build flexible organizational structures that can adapt to changing business needs
core_values.inefficiency_detection: Find rigid processes that break down when requirements change
core_values.optimization_guidance: Build flexibility and exception handling into standard processes

twelve_principles.principle: Our highest priority is to satisfy the customer through early and continuous delivery of valuable software
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Deliver approvals quickly and continuously rather than in batches
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Design approval processes that provide immediate value to employees
twelve_principles.measurement: Time from request to approval, stakeholder satisfaction scores

twelve_principles.principle: Welcome changing requirements, even late in development
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Allow travel request modifications without starting over
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Create change management processes that are efficient and user-friendly
twelve_principles.measurement: Percentage of requests that can be modified without restarting the process

twelve_principles.principle: Deliver working software frequently, from a couple of weeks to a couple of months
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Process approvals in hours/days, not weeks/months
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Establish service level agreements that prioritize speed
twelve_principles.measurement: Average approval cycle time, percentage of approvals within SLA

twelve_principles.principle: Business people and developers must work together daily
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Travelers and approvers should have direct communication channels
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Remove barriers between business units and support functions
twelve_principles.measurement: Frequency of direct stakeholder communication, resolution time for issues

twelve_principles.workflow_application: Empower employees to make appropriate travel decisions within guidelines
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Design roles and responsibilities that leverage individual expertise
twelve_principles.measurement: Employee empowerment scores, decision-making authority levels

twelve_principles.principle: The most efficient and effective method of conveying information is face-to-face conversation
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Use real-time communication tools for approval discussions rather than email chains
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Design communication protocols that prioritize direct interaction
twelve_principles.measurement: Communication effectiveness scores, time to resolution for complex issues

twelve_principles.principle: Working software is the primary measure of progress
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Measure success by completed approvals, not documentation or meetings
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Focus metrics on business outcomes rather than activity measures
twelve_principles.measurement: Business outcome metrics vs. activity metrics ratio

twelve_principles.workflow_application: Create workflows that don't overburden approvers or create burnout
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Design workload distribution that maintains quality and employee wellbeing
twelve_principles.measurement: Employee satisfaction, workload balance, quality metrics

twelve_principles.principle: Continuous attention to technical excellence and good design enhances agility
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Continuously improve workflow design and automation capabilities
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Invest in capabilities and systems that enhance organizational agility
twelve_principles.measurement: Process improvement frequency, system capability maturity

twelve_principles.principle: Simplicity--the art of maximizing the amount of work not done--is essential
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Eliminate unnecessary approval steps and redundant activities
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Design lean organizational structures that minimize waste
twelve_principles.measurement: Process step count, value-added activity percentage

twelve_principles.principle: The best architectures, requirements, and designs emerge from self-organizing teams
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Allow teams to optimize their own travel approval processes within guidelines
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Enable autonomous teams with clear boundaries and objectives

twelve_principles.principle: At regular intervals, the team reflects on how to become more effective
twelve_principles.workflow_application: Regular retrospectives on travel approval process effectiveness
twelve_principles.operating_model_application: Build continuous improvement into organizational routines

agile_detection_rules.description: Too many approval levels violates Agile 'simplicity' principle
agile_detection_rules.framework_basis: Agile Principle: Simplicity - maximize work not done
agile_detection_rules.optimization: Consolidate approval levels, implement delegation rules

agile_detection_rules.description: Long approval times violate 'early and continuous delivery' principle
agile_detection_rules.framework_basis: Agile Principle: Early and continuous delivery of value
agile_detection_rules.optimization: Implement real-time approval notifications, parallel processing

agile_detection_rules.description: Cannot handle changes/exceptions violates 'responding to change'
agile_detection_rules.threshold: Process restarts required for minor changes
agile_detection_rules.framework_basis: Agile Value: Responding to change over following a plan

agile_detection_rules.description: Lack of direct communication violates 'individuals and interactions'
agile_detection_rules.threshold: < 30% of approvals involve direct stakeholder communication
agile_detection_rules.framework_basis: Agile Value: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools

operating_model_design_principles.structure: Flat hierarchies with clear decision rights
operating_model_design_principles.metrics: Focus on business outcomes and customer satisfaction
operating_model_design_principles.adaptation: Built-in mechanisms for continuous adaptation and improvement
